name: Pollywog
overview: Pollywog is a 1-player arcade game for the VIC-20. The player controls a frog who moves in the cardinal direction, and tries to reach their lily pad on the other side of a river. The player tries to jump between turtles that cross the river in varying directions and speed, and the frog drowns if it falls in the water. If all 4 lily pads are filled the player moves to a more challenging level. The player starts with 3 lives.
